Q213. Do you have acess to smart phone? Do you have acess to mobile data ? Which language/s you can speak? Which language/s you can read? Which language/s you can write? Which language/s you prefer for communication, speaking with others? Which language/s you prefer for mobile use? Which category of waste picker you belong to? Type of employment/engagement What kind of wastes you pick/sort? Where do you sell/dispose the wastes you collect? Primary source of income Number of working days in a month for primary job Average daily income from primary source of income (in Rs) Do you have a secondary source of income? What is your secondary source of income? Number of working days in a month for secondary job Average daily income from secondary source of income (in Rs) Do you have Aadhar Card Do you have Voter I-Card Do you have PAN Card Do you have Income Certificate Do you have Caste Certificate Do you have Savings Bank Account Have you availed any services/schemes in the past 6 months? Please provide details of service provider/department from where you availed the scheme. Are you currently availing any scheme/service? Please provide details of the service/scheme that you are availing. Do you possess any skills for jobs other than waste picking? Are you interested in taking up new job/starting new business? If Yes, what alternative job/business would you like to do if you get an opportunity? Are you a member of any collective such as CIG/SHG/JLG/DWCC? What is the name of the collective that you are part of?

Q301. What is the tenure of the President/Office bearer (in complete years) Q302. Has there been any rotation of the roles of the member (in last one year) Q303. Has there been any election for the office bearer Q304. In what frequency the election for office bearer happens?(in complete years) Q305. Does your Sangha have a common (group) bank account Q305a. what are the challenges in opening bank account Q306. How much does each member contribute to group savings Q306a. Please specify the others (in INR) Q307. In what frequency the members contribute to the group savings Q307a. Please specify others Q308. Are the members regularly saving (as per the group decision)? Q309a. From where the members avail the loan? Q309b. Please specify others Q310. What are the challenges in availing loan (minimum 1 and maximum upto 3 responses possible) Q401. Are meetings conducted in your Sangha/group/collective? Q402. What is the frequency of meetings? Q402a. Please specify others Q403. Regularity of members attending meeting Q404. Does the meetings happen as per the schedule (check meeting register) Q405. Does your Sangha/group/ collective have a record book? (check for the record book) Q406. Is the record book /register updated in every meeting? Q501. Has the Sangha/group/collective established any linkage with (options below) Q501a. Please specify the others Q501b. What service/services you are getting through this linkage(more than one response upto three is possible). Q502. Is your sangha /collective currently availing any services/ schemes Q502a. Please provide details of the service/scheme that you are availing (more than one response upto three is possible) Q502b. From which department/service provider you are availing this scheme/service? Q601. Is your Sangha / collective members interested in taking up any collective enterprise/business Q602a. Please specify others Q602.
